keyPoints: This Responsive Web Design course will help you learn the key aspects of building a responsive website. This will include valuable skills such as HTML and CSS, the foundations for being a skilled web developer. Advancing these skills will help you be more competitive on the Topcoder platform, and more desirable to potential employers. Once you complete this course, we will issue you a Topcoder Academy certificate of course completion which you can use to showcase your new learnings and skills.
